forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
The early hours in Downtown San Francisco unveil a sleek canvas, painted with a blend of soft clouds and gentle breezes. With temperatures settling at a cozy 53 degrees, the air carries whispers of the sea, as winds from the west-southwest weave between the buildings, bringing a refreshing chill typical of this coastal realm. The promise of a sunny Friday lies ahead, with a peak temperature flirting around 64 degrees—a reminder that summer glimmers on the horizon, albeit shyly.

As the day unfolds, the city will bask under vast blue skies, the sun casting a warm embrace across the bustling streets. Though there may be a fleeting blush of cool air in the afternoon, it invites the more intrepid to step outside in lightweight layers—perhaps a light sweater over a casual shirt, ideal for a stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely coffee at a quaint corner café. Look to the horizon for lingering hints of fog that may grace the Golden Gate, while the warmth of the sun beckons one to enjoy the day’s charm, whether it’s a quiet moment in a park or a gentle exploration of hidden alleyways. Amidst the bustle, quiet pleasures await—embrace the day with spontaneity and simple joys.
